DOC.brief_summary: The investigator develop game-based sexual violence prevention program use bystander intervention approach . This program call Bystander design use high school student grade 9-12 . The goal research evaluate efficacy feasibility Bystander implement school setting . The research capture data knowledge sexual violence harassment , well attitude , self-efficacy , perceive social norm behavioral intention around bystander behavior . This research consist baseline survey , program participation , immediate post-program survey , 3-month follow survey youth participant . It also involve qualitative in-depth interview school staff administration program .
DOC.brief_title: In-School Evaluation Bystander : A Game-Based Intervention Sexual Violence Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: Using investigator ' experience game-based learning , digital medium , behavior theory , adolescent sexual reproductive health , investigator develop digital game-based sexual violence prevention program—Bystander—to use high school student teach prosocial bystander behavior decrease acceptance common rape myth . The goal research evaluate efficacy feasibility Bystander implement school setting . This study evaluate Bystander , four-module intervention program . Each module design last one school class period . It include 20 minute individual gameplay interactive narrative feature prosocial bystander behavior discussion dispel rape myth . Each module also include facilitated class discussion topic cover day . The research team conduct pre/post efficacy feasibility study capture data pre- , immediate post- , 3-month follow survey knowledge sexual violence harassment , well attitude , self-efficacy , perceive social norm behavioral intention around bystander behavior ( measure pre- , immediate post- follow-up time point ) . It also capture demographic information previous bystander behavior baseline . It finally involve qualitative in-depth interview school staff administration program .
DOC.criteria: Age 1319 year A student grade 912 one three identify study site school Able speak read English 7th grade level Provide inform consent express willingness complete followup survey .
